page.title: 03The start of Mark's day
page.content: It is 8'o clock. My mum says its time to get up. I think "Oh no, it's school! Boring old assembly." So I say I am not well, but my mum has heard it all before. When I finally get out of bed I go down stairs. I get my breakfast. Mum says, "Here's your cornflakes and tea." After getting dressed I go to have a wash. Next I go to the bus stop with Paul Wright. We talk about last night's television."It was good in the"A Team" when that car crashed into the truck." Paul told me a joke. "What did the cross-eyed teacher say?" "I don't know." "She said I can't control my pupils!" I mostly take 20p to school and get a packet of fruit gums. When I get into the school playground I play with Andrew or talk about computers.
